title: 1980 12’ Ford Stakeside (Not Running)
item_description:
1980 12’ Ford Stakeside (Not Running)

Specifications

  • Year: 1980
  • Make: Ford
  • VIN: F60HVJJ0440
  • License #: 5J29959
    • Registration Expiration: 8/31/2009
    • PNO-REGISTRATION
  • Odometer Reads: 93,425
  • Key: Available
  • GVWR: 16,500
  • Engine: V8
  • Body Style: Select One
  • Fuel Type: Gasoline
  • Transmission: Select One
  • Deck Length: 144”
  • Deck Width: 96”
  • Wall Height: 48”

Note: Application for Replacement Title and Transfer Form will be mailed 1-2 weeks following the last day of removal. The Seller sells this truck "as-is" in non-running condition and with planned non-op registration; the Seller will not perform smog. The Buyer agrees to the responsibility to repair and pass smog. The Buyer agrees to purchase the vehicle "as-is" and agrees to repair and smog vehicle. An "as-is" no-smog bill of sale must be signed by both buyer/seller in an agreement to these stated terms. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of the inspections, transfer, repair and smog, registration, sales tax, and fees due to DMV.
